channel.title: James Bonding
channel.description: Matt and Matt. Bond over Bond. Matt Gourley and Matt Mira love James Bond so much they decided to make a podcast about it. Each episode they invite a guest to dive deep into one movie from the greatest film franchise known to man. Looking for the archives? All episodes older than 6 months can be found exclusively on Stitcher Premium, ad-free. Go to stitcher.com/premium and use promo code EARWOLF for 1 month free (and $5 off the annual plan!).
channel.itunes:author: Matt Gourley and Matt Mira and Earwolf
channel.itunes:summary: Matt and Matt. Bond over Bond. Matt Gourley and Matt Mira love James Bond so much they decided to make a podcast about it. All episodes older than 6 months can be found exclusively on Stitcher Premium, ad-free. Go to stitcher.com/premium and use promo code EARWOLF for 1 month free (and $5 off the annual plan!).

item.title: Episode 075: For Your Eyes Only with John Ross Bowie
item.description: John Ross Bowie from Speechless and The Big Bang Theory joins Matt and Matt to talk about Moore's most serious entry in the Bond franchise. Well, serious except for the Thatcher thing, but you can't have it all.
item.content:encoded: John Ross Bowie from Speechless and The Big Bang Theory joins Matt and Matt to talk about Moore's most serious entry in the Bond franchise. Well, serious except for the Thatcher thing, but you can't have it all.

item.title: Episode 074: Bond, James Bond: Ranked
item.description: This week, Matt and Matt discuss every time an actor has said Bond James Bond in a Bond film. Then they pick their favorites. Because of course they do.
item.content:encoded: This week, Matt and Matt discuss every time an actor has said Bond James Bond in a Bond film. Then they pick their favorites. Because of course they do.

item.title: Episode 073: Live and Let Die With Phil Nobile JR
item.description: Our man in the East, Phil Nobile Jr returns to talk all manner of Roger Moore, New Orleans and Voodoo. #KanangaBalloon
item.content:encoded: Our man in the East, Phil Nobile Jr returns to talk all manner of Roger Moore, New Orleans and Voodoo. #KanangaBalloon

item.title: Episode 072: Our Man In The East Returns! Phil Nobile Jr
item.description: Phil Nobile Jr, newly appointed Editor in Chief of FANGORIA magazine, stops by to talk to Matt and Matt about Bond 25, the state of the franchise and the idea of trying to dress/live like James Bond. Give it a listen, won't you.
item.content:encoded: Phil Nobile Jr, newly appointed Editor in Chief of FANGORIA magazine, stops by to talk to Matt and Matt about Bond 25, the state of the franchise and the idea of trying to dress/live like James Bond. Give it a listen, won't you.

item.title: Episode 071: Thunderball with Maria Blasucci and Amanda Lund
item.description: James Bond is back! And so are Maria and Amanda from last week as we all discuss the underwater adventure that was Connery's fourth 007 film. Will it fare better than last time? Press play to find out.
item.content:encoded: James Bond is back! And so are Maria and Amanda from last week as we all discuss the underwater adventure that was Connery's fourth 007 film. Will it fare better than last time? Press play to find out.

item.title: Episode 070: Vesper's Dilemma Crossover Episode With The Big Ones
item.description: Guest favorites Amanda Lund and Maria Blasucci join the Matts for James Bonding, or do the Matts join them for The Big Ones? Either way, it's the podcast crossover event of the century and it's all about Vesper Lynd's moral dilemma in Casino Royale. And there's also a little bit of Nick Nack.
item.content:encoded: Guest favorites Amanda Lund and Maria Blasucci join the Matts for James Bonding, or do the Matts join them for The Big Ones? Either way, it's the podcast crossover event of the century and it's all about Vesper Lynd's moral dilemma in Casino Royale. And there's also a little bit of Nick Nack.

Either way, it's the podcast crossover event of the century and it's all about Vesper Lynd's moral dilemma in Casino Royale. And there's also a little bit of Nick Nack.

item.title: Episode 069: The World Is Not Enough with Dani Snow
item.description: Dani Snow from DC Comics joins the boys to talk Brosnan's third, its ladies and its villains.

item.title: Episode 068: Casino Royale '67 with Maurice LaMarche
item.description: Voice over god Maurice LaMarche joins the Matts for a frank discussion about the infamous 1967 Casino Royale. Also, Orson Welles and Ian Fleming might stop by for a quick conversation. I don't know, you'll have to listen.

item.title: Episode 067: SPECTRE with Doree Shafrir and Amanda Lund
item.description: The Matts' better halves join the Matts to discuss Daniel Craig's latest outing as Bond and what it's like to be married to a Bond head.

item.title: Episode 066: Bond and Star Wars with Pete The Retailer, Alex Robinson, James Bladon and Mark McConville
item.description: Alex and Pete from Star Wars Minute and Mark McConville and James Bladon join Matt and Matt to discuss which actors have been in both franchises, complete with Power Point presentation!

item.title: Episode 063: From Russia With Love with Kevin T. Porter
item.description: The ever-charming Kevin T. Porter sits down with the Matts to discuss the 2nd, and perhaps most highly regarded Bond movie ever. They also discuss some other things. It's James Bonding! We talk about many many things actually.

item.title: Episode 061: The Man With The Golden Gun with Emily Schmemily
item.description: Head of Social Media, Emily Schmemily, joins the boys for a frank but loving discussion about one of the slower Bonds. Also, there's some Star Wars.

item.title: Episode 060: Every Gadget Ever
item.description: Matt and Matt talk about each gadget then decided on their favorite from each James Bond Film! It's like a podcast that is ALSO a list of gadgets.

item.title: Episode 059: Moonraker with Bobak Ferdowsi and James Bladon
item.description: Space James Bond calls for space James Bonding guests. Actual beloved Nasa scientist Bobak Ferdowsi and actual beloved return guest Jimmy Blades join the boys to go over the moon for 007!
item.content:encoded: Space James Bond calls for space James Bonding guests. Actual beloved Nasa scientist Bobak Ferdowsi and actual beloved return guest Jimmy Blades join the boys to go over the moon for 007!

item.title: Episode 058: Top Ten Odd Casting Choices for James Bond Movies
item.description: Matt and Matt each made lists with what they feel are the TOP TEN oddest casting choices. These are the actors that stood out. Some for good reasons and others for being Wayne Newton.
item.content:encoded: Matt and Matt each made lists with what they feel are the TOP TEN oddest casting choices. These are the actors that stood out. Some for good reasons and others for being Wayne Newton.

item.title: Episode 057: Diamonds Are Forever with Kristian Bruun
item.description: The Matt's are joined by Kristian Bruun to dive head first, like Bond into the Baja seas, into Connery's final official outing as 007.
item.content:encoded: The Matt's are joined by Kristian Bruun to dive head first, like Bond into the Baja seas, into Connery's final official outing as 007.

item.title: Episode 056: The Movie Posters of James Bond
item.description: Matt and Matt take you on a journey of all 25 official one sheets for James Bond. Iconic imagery and weird poses that sometimes defy the laws of physics. We cover it all this week.
item.content:encoded: Matt and Matt take you on a journey of all 25 official one sheets for James Bond. Iconic imagery and weird poses that sometimes defy the laws of physics. We cover it all this week.

item.title: Episode 055: On Her Majesty's Secret Service with Maurice LaMarche
item.description: The Matts sit down to talk one of the best Bonds there is with one of the best voices there is, Maurice LaMarche. Plus, Ian Fleming and Orson Welles may stop by. Not sure, you'll have to listen.

item.title: Episode 053: Die Another Day with Andy Secunda
item.description: Friend of the show Andy Secunda joins Matt and Matt to dissect the wonderfully diseased corpse of Brosnan's last outing as Bond.

item.title: Episode 052: Villain Deaths Ranked
item.description: 'No Mr. Bond, I expect me to die!' Matt and Matt rank the fates of the villains, killed, survived, or otherwise on this latest installment of James Bonding.
item.content:encoded: 'No Mr. Bond, I expect me to die!' Matt and Matt rank the fates of the villains, killed, survived, or otherwise on this latest installment of James Bonding.

item.title: Episode 051: You Only Live Twice with Paul F. Tompkins
item.description: Three-timer's Club guest Paul F. Tompkins joins the Matts on a fun-filled journey to the east as they discuss Connery's fifth outing as 007.

item.description: It's the movie that spawned this podcast! Paul Sabourin takes a beat from Paul and Storm to talk to Matt and Matt about Daniel Craig's 3rd Bond film... Skyfall.
